name: Granny's Dreams
description:
Granny has to fight her nighterrors but is only equiped with a shield and shining beam of light. How long can she resist the onrush of her horrible nightmares?

Move with WASD

Steer the shield with the Mouse

Shoot with Mouse Click

You have four Charges. When you get hit without any charges left, well.. you don't want to know what happens then...
